name: Alchemist
description: The ALCHEMIST specializes in powerful buffing Vials and consumable potency.
unlock: Get grabbed by the manticora when you get close to a drain. It will grab you to it's lair.

name: Archon
description: The Archon is the master of Weapon Mods and Mod Power generation
unlock: First you need to ding a locked door at The Labyrinth, to open it you need the Master Portal Key found at the Labyrinth and being with the Status CORRUPTED.

name: Challenger
description: The CHALLENGER specializes in close range combat and heightened survivability.
unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

name: Engineer
description: The ENGINEER specializes in Heavy Weaponry which can be carried or placed in turret mode.
unlock: Found on the ground in a toxic and foggy area near the Titan's Reach world stone. You will need some healing and status resistances.

name: Explorer
description: The EXPLORER spcializes in finding valuable items and overall team utility

name: Gunslinger
description: The GUNSLINGER specializes in raw damage, firearm handling, and ammo conservation.
unlock: Exahust dialoge with Mudtooth after finishing the second world

name: Handler
description: The HANDLER specializes in teamwork in both solo and cooperative scenarios.
unlock: Buy from Mudtooth at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

name: Hunter
description: The HUNTER specializes in ranged damage, precision shots and marking enemies.
unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

name: Invader
description: The INVADER specializes elusiveness nad misdirecting the enemy's focus
unlock: Use the Dreamcatcher weapon on a blue sparkle stone to get Walker's Dream. Use it, the defeat Bane Boss.

name: Medic
description: The MEDIC specializes in survivability with enhanced healing and Relic effectiveness.
unlock: Buy from Dr. Norah at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

name: Summoner
description: The SUMMONER specializes in using Minions to do their bidding and sacrificing them.
unlock: Buy the Faded Grimoire it from the Bloodmoon Altar.
